doc.previous: International passengers departing out of terminal 1 perform their check in and undergo passport control and security screening in terminal 1, after which they are bussed directly to the departures area of terminal 3. Passengers with carry-on luggage only who have printed their boarding pass prior to arriving at the airport may proceed directly to terminal 3 for passport control and security screening. Incoming flights for airlines operating out of terminal 1 are handled solely in Terminal 3. A free shuttle from terminal 3 and the railway station to and from terminal 1 operates approximately every 15 to 30 minutes (depending on the time of day).
